page.title: 15CUSTOMS AND TRADITIONS
page.content:
People used to dance around the bonfire on the shortest day. A long-demolished cottage used to belong to an old woman who loved cats whom people used to call the witch. There used to be stocks on Low Green in which miscreants had to sit as a punishment but there is no sign of them now.
The Travelling People still come to the area, variously known as gypsies or tinkers. They live in large caravans, unlike the old vardoes, and have cars and trucks. They deal in various merchandise as well as scrap metal. Local people, on the whole, do not trust them.
